EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Sys Admin Day Eve, {{lead.First Name:default=}}! Win a Tauntaun Sleeping Bag
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Happy Sys Admin Day Eve!
Join the Green Circle Community, Share Your Funny Story, & Win a Tauntaun Sleeping Bag <http://bit.ly/1rtT6kE> This Sys Admin Day, Shake Your Tauntaun. System Administrators of the IT Galaxy: WE SALUTE YOU. Join the Green Circle Community, share your funniest on-the-job story, and snag votes. The story with the most votes will receive a coveted Tauntaun sleeping bag. Tauntaun! <"http://bit.ly/1rtT6kE> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
